steroid therapy for symptomatic or progressive disease.
bilateral hilar adenopathy and reticular interstitial disease.  expected postoperative median sternotomy changes.

infectious etiology
63 year male with 5 year history of sarcoid, asymptomatic
this is an atypical presentation due to the patient's age. however, he is largely asymptomatic as are approximately 50 % of people who are diagnosed incidentaly.
